name: Counter Combat Strike
description:
Fearless fighters, you must use all your professional skills to counter terrorists. Hold your weapon, aim and pull the trigger. You will suddenly attack behind the enemies around the changed location. Complete all the incredible missions to clear all patrolled enemies. Your enemies do not know your existence in their area. So, execute your best tactical shooter attack abilities. You have a highly camouflage coat, advanced sniper rifle, which will help you to complete the mission better. You must establish your own rules of survival and win the war with your wisdom and superb ability.

What are you waiting for? Let's embark on the journey to end the awesome battle shooting game and destroy all terrorists.

Features:
- Ultra realistic 3D graphics and cool animations
- Hundreds of thrilling missions
- Tons of letal guns and mortal weapons
- Addicting FPS gameplay
- Easy and intuitive controls
- Free game: play it both on your phone and tablet
